verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

This \add is\add* the \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* thee a \w red|strong="H0122"\w* \w heifer|strong="H6510"\w* without \w spot|strong="H8549"\w*, wherein \add is\add* no \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, \add and\add* upon which \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*:

And ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* her unto \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, that he may bring her \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, and \add one\add* shall \w slay|strong="H7819"\w* her \w before|strong="H6440"\w* his face:

And \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of her \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* with his \w finger|strong="H0676"\w*, and \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* of her \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w directly|strong="H5227"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*:

And \add one\add* shall \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* the \w heifer|strong="H6510"\w* in his \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*; her \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, and her \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and her \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, with her \w dung|strong="H6569"\w*, shall he \w burn|strong="H8313"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w hyssop|strong="H0231"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8438"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \add it\add* into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w burning|strong="H8316"\w* of the \w heifer|strong="H6510"\w*.

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and he shall \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And he that \w burneth|strong="H8313"\w* her shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add that is\add* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* shall \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* up the \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w* of the \w heifer|strong="H6510"\w*, and lay \add them\add* \w up|strong="H3240"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* in a \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and it shall be \w kept|strong="H4931"\w* for the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* for a \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w separation|strong="H5079"\w*: it \add is\add* a purification for \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.

And he that \w gathereth|strong="H0622"\w* the \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w* of the \w heifer|strong="H6510"\w* shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*: and it shall be unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and unto the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them, for a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

¶ He that \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w body|strong="H5315"\w* of any \w man|strong="H0120"\w* shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 19.11 \ft man: Heb. soul of man\f*

He shall \w purify|strong="H2398"\w* himself with it on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* he shall be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*: but if he \w purify|strong="H2398"\w* not himself the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, then the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* he shall not be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

Whosoever \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w body|strong="H5315"\w* of any \w man|strong="H0120"\w* that is \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, and \w purifieth|strong="H2398"\w* not himself, \w defileth|strong="H2930"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and that \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: because the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w separation|strong="H5079"\w* was not \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* upon him, he shall be \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*; his \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* \add is\add* yet upon him.

This \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, when a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w dieth|strong="H4191"\w* in a \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*: all that \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and all that \add is\add* in the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.
And every \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*, which hath no \w covering|strong="H6781"\w* \w bound|strong="H6616"\w* upon it, \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

And whosoever \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* one that is \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* with a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* in the \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, or a dead \w body|strong="H4191"\w*, or a \w bone|strong="H6106"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, or a \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*, shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And for an \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \add person\add* they shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w ashes|strong="H6083"\w* of the burnt \w heifer|strong="H8316"\w* of purification for \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, and \w running|strong="H2416"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* shall be \w put|strong="H5414"\w* thereto in a \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*:\f + \fr 19.17 \ft ashes: Heb. dust\f*\f + \fr 19.17 \ft running…: Heb. living waters shall be given\f*

And a \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w person|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w hyssop|strong="H0231"\w*, and \w dip|strong="H2881"\w* \add it\add* in the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and upon all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and upon the \w persons|strong="H5315"\w* that were there, and upon him that \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* a \w bone|strong="H6106"\w*, or one \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, or one \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, or a \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*:

And the \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \add person\add* shall \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* upon the \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: and on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* he shall \w purify|strong="H2398"\w* himself, and \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* himself in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and shall be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

But the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*, and shall not \w purify|strong="H2398"\w* himself, that \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*, because he hath \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w separation|strong="H5079"\w* hath not been \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* upon him; he \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

And it shall be a \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* unto them, that he that \w sprinkleth|strong="H5137"\w* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w separation|strong="H5079"\w* shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*; and he that \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w separation|strong="H5079"\w* shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And whatsoever the \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \add person\add* \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*; and the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* that \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* \add it\add* shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.
